info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 12:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cochise County through 130 PM MST... At 1245 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tombstone, or 18 miles northeast of Sierra Vista, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tombstone and Pearce-Sunsites. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 312 and 322. Route 82 between mile markers 66 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
